title: What are some older songs that use the Mixolydian mode? - Quora

response.answer_text: The oldest song I can think of in that mode was wildly popular in its day and subject to a lot of 'covers' and 'mash-ups'. It's called the Armed Man (L'Homme armé) and it's "day"was about 1451, i.e. only about 500 years before Elvis ...    Some versions transpose it to the Dorian mode but the original was mixolydian:
